Articles.Content:
The transfer stage uses the T.A.C. Life Support mod and stock parts. It has enough delta V to get to Duna from a 100 Km orbit around Kerbin. The craft file comes with a launch stage to launch the transfer vehicle into orbit. It has about 2500 m/s of delta v. The craft has four 6x1 solar arrays to power the craft and 2000 electric charge. It can carry up too 7 kerbals to Duna, but only 3 can land in the surface. The lander has 300 m/s of delta v. Lander has two generators powering the craft all the time. Warranty void if used in water.

The Lander's craft file will be coming out soon, just needs some tweaking to make it land properly. If I have time I will make a replica of Mars-One's base.

Images:

http://imgur.com/a/WVewW

Download:

http://www./view/et2ec3dzhw5rl6z/Mars%20One-Transfer%20Stage.craft

Edited December 15, 2013 by greatmatt567

Looks great, but might I suggest clipping Lvt-45's into the feul tanks, so that only the nozzles show, instead of the poodles, that should help, as the exhaust nozzles on the real transfer vehicle seem larger. This might not give enough Ã¢Ë†â€ v, so you could add some more feul tanks.
Thanks, I will try clipping some more fuel tanks into the hitch hiker storage.
